zombiehouse.level.zombie

Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • zombiehouse.level.zombie.Zombie
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineWalkZombie, MasterZombie, RandomWalkZombie

    public class Zombie
extends java.lang.Object
    Zombie class that contains methods inherited by the sub-classes of Zombie as well as all Zombie variables.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int aStarFrame
      Frame at which A* starts working
      int bifurcatedFrame
      frame at which the zombie bifurcated
      Tile curTile
      the Tile the Zombie is currently in inside the ZombieHouse
      boolean diesToPastSelf
      whether or not this zombie dies to the past self
      boolean interactedWithPS
      whether or not this zombie interacted with the past self
      boolean isAddedToScene
      if zombie is added to the scene
      int positionForBifurcated
      the position at which the zombie bifurcated
      double positionX
      the Zombie's current X coordinate in the ZombieHouse
      double positionY
      the Zombie's current Y coordinate in the ZombieHouse
      int type
      This declares what type of a zombie this is 0:Random walk zombie 1:Line walk zombie 2:Master zombie
      Zombie3D zombie3D
      The Zombie3D that represents this zombie in a 3D graphical world
      int zombieID
      this Zombie's ID number

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Zombie(double heading, double positionX, double positionY, Tile curTile, int id, int life, int deathFrame, int type)
      Constructs a Zombie object with the specified heading, X coordinate position, Y coordinate position, and the Tile it is in, preferably as given by its X and Y coordinates

      Calculates whether the Zombie has collided with an object and sets the Zombie's collided value accordingly

      Get the y position from the zombie's history
      int getZombieSmell() 
      void makeDecision()
      An abstract method inherited and implements by all sub-classes of Zombie
      void makeHeading()
      Used to tell the Zombie where to go once using the A* path obtained from calcPath()
      void move()
      Sets the X and Y coordinates of this Zombie to the position altered by a factor of zombie_Speed and by the heading of the Zombie assuming the Zombie's collided value is false, otherwise, it will not change its coordinate or curTile parameters.
      void printPath()
      Used to test if the path was being calculated correctly

      Tests to see if this Zombie can smell the player

      • move

        public void move()
        Sets the X and Y coordinates of this Zombie to the position altered by a factor of zombie_Speed and by the heading of the Zombie assuming the Zombie's collided value is false, otherwise, it will not change its coordinate or curTile parameters.

      • collide

        public void collide(double desiredX,
                    double desiredY)
        Calculates whether the Zombie has collided with an object and sets the Zombie's collided value accordingly

      • scentDetection

        public boolean scentDetection(int searchDepth,
                              Tile[][] house)
        Tests to see if this Zombie can smell the player
        Parameters:
        searchDepth - the Zombie's zombie_Smell
        house - the 2d array of Tiles to search through
        Returns:
        true if the Zombie can smell the player, otherwise returns false

        house -
